name: Md Hasibul Hasan
summary: Machine Learning Engineer with 3+ years of experience in building intelligent recommender systems, data-driven pipelines, and end-to-end ML infrastructure. Expertise in collaborative filtering, personalization engines, and scalable vector-based search systems. Proven ability to deliver real-world impact with robust data intelligence and recommendation solutions.

bullet_points: Built a full-stack AI platform that matches job seekers and employers using vector similarity (KNN and cosine) over curated embeddings.
Integrated PostgreSQL + PGVector with backend APIs and a responsive frontend for candidates and recruiters.
Implemented smart filtering and transparent matching logic using contextual embeddings and scalable inference pipelines.
Engineered a hybrid recommendation engine using collaborative and content-based filtering with dynamic weight adjustments based on user behavior.
Designed for scalability and adaptability to evolving user preferences for improved personalization.
Built dynamic recommendation pipelines for both batch and real-time inference.

projects.project_name: Smart Audio Player with AI Features
bullet_points: Developed personalized audio recommendation logic using behavioral signals and contextual features.
Integrated song recognition, lyric generation, and playback intelligence to enhance UX.
Enabled both online and offline recommendations using vector embeddings and heuristics.

education.institution: Suti VM Pilot Model High School, Gopalpur, Tangail

education.education_name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & Engineering
